body_html: Is there ever a case where user error would be responsible for having a model learn on single batch during train mode and then have the error be significantly different (worse) when switching to eval mode but applying on the same single batch that was trained on?
body_text: Is there ever a case where user error would be responsible for having a model learn on single batch during train mode and then have the error be significantly different (worse) when switching to eval mode but applying on the same single batch that was trained on?
body: Is there ever a case where user error would be responsible for having a model learn on single batch during train mode and then have the error be significantly different (worse) when switching to eval mode but applying on the same single batch that was trained on?
